headline: A Bollywood Star Takes On a Global Stigma
abstract: Deepika Padukone’s new movie, “Chhapaak,” highlights the activism of survivors of acid attacks.
lead_paragraph: Deepika Padukone, one of the highest-paid and best-known actresses in Bollywood, can afford to choose her roles carefully and with purpose. With her newest film — the first she has produced — she chose to make a statement about acid attacks in India.
